report.name: ppcm_listpers

dataSource.name: Q_POLE
dataSource.select:
-- cas 1 -- ressource avec une situation en cours select distinct pack_utile.f_get_deppole(substr(To_char(sit.codsg, 'FM0000000'),1,5)) libpole, res.rnom nom, res.rprenom prenom, res.rtel tel, rtrim(imm.iadrabr) immeuble, res.batiment|| res.etage|| res.bureau bureau, sit.ident ident, res.matricule matricule, sit.prestation prestation, sit.mode_contractuel_indicatif mci, sit.soccode societe, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..','****',decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','Interv. forf.',to_char(sit.cout,'FM999999999D00'))) cout, st.gnom responsable, substr(TO_CHAR(st.codsg, 'FM0000000'), 0, 5) code, --decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','',decode(sit.soccode,'SG..','****',to_char(lc.lresfin,'dd/mm/yyyy'))) echeance, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','',to_char(lc.lresfin,'dd/mm/yyyy')) echeance, sit.cpident code_CP, sit.fident Code_lien_forf, -- champs pour faire les totaux des effectifs decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',1,0) SG , decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',0,1) SSII , decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'GRA',1,0),0) SG_GRA, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'INT',1,0),0) SG_INT, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'STA',1,0),0) SG_STA, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'IFO',1,0),0) SG_IFO, decode(sit.prestation,'STA',1,decode(sit.prestation,'INT',1,decode(sit.prestation,'GRA',1,decode(sit.prestation,'IFO',1,0))))GRA_INT_STA from situ_ress_full sit, ligne_cont lc, ressource res, struct_info st, immeuble imm
where res.icodimm = imm.icodimm(+) and sit.ident=res.ident --and res.rtype='P' and sit.codsg=st.codsg --and sit.soccode <> 'SG..' and sit.ident=lc.ident -- situation en cours (dans le mois) and to_char(sit.datsitu,'yyyymm') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and ( to_char(sit.datdep,'yyyymm') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or sit.datdep is null) and lc.lresfin in (select max(l.lresfin) from ligne_cont l where l.ident=res.ident and to_char(l.lresdeb,'yyyymm') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and ( to_char(l.lresfin,'yyyymm') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or l.lresfin is null) ) and sit.type_situ='N' &P_WHERE UNION -- cas 2 -- ressource avec une situation en cours select distinct pack_utile.f_get_deppole(substr(To_char(sit.codsg, 'FM0000000'),1,5)) libpole, res.rnom nom, res.rprenom prenom, res.rtel tel, rtrim(imm.iadrabr) immeuble, res.batiment|| res.etage|| res.bureau bureau, sit.ident ident, res.matricule matricule, sit.prestation prestation, sit.mode_contractuel_indicatif mci, sit.soccode societe, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..','****',decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','Interv. forf.',to_char(sit.cout,'FM999999999D00'))) cout, st.gnom responsable, substr(TO_CHAR(st.codsg, 'FM0000000'),0,5) code, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','',decode(sit.soccode,'SG..','****','')) echeance, sit.cpident code_CP, sit.fident Code_lien_forf, -- champs pour faire les totaux des effectifs decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',1,0) SG , decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',0,1) SSII , decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'GRA',1,0),0) SG_GRA, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'INT',1,0),0) SG_INT, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'STA',1,0),0) SG_STA, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'IFO',1,0),0) SG_IFO, decode(sit.prestation,'STA',1,decode(sit.prestation,'INT',1,decode(sit.prestation,'GRA',1,decode(sit.prestation,'IFO',1,0))))GRA_INT_STA from situ_ress_full sit, ressource res, struct_info st, immeuble imm
where res.icodimm = imm.icodimm(+) and sit.ident=res.ident --and res.rtype='P' and sit.codsg=st.codsg -- situation en cours (dans le mois) and to_char(sit.datsitu,'yyyymm') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and ( to_char(sit.datdep,'yyyymm') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or sit.datdep is null) and sit.type_situ='N' and res.ident NOT IN (select lc.ident from ligne_cont lc where to_char(lc.lresdeb,'yyyymm')<= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and (to_char(lc.lresfin,'yyyymm')>= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or lc.lresfin is null )) &P_WHERE
order by 2,3,code;

dataDescriptor.expression: decode ( sit.prestation , 'STA' , 1 , decode ( sit.prestation , 'INT' , 1 , decode ( sit.prestation , 'GRA' , 1 , decode ( sit.prestation , 'IFO' , 1 , 0 ) ) ) )
decode ( sit.soccode , 'SG..' , '****' , decode ( sit.prestation , 'IFO' , 'Interv. forf.' , to_char ( sit.cout , 'FM999999999D00' ) ) )

dataSource.name: Q_GROUPE
dataSource.select: -- cas 1 -- Ressource avec une situation en cours ( SG ou SSII avec un contrat) select distinct pack_utile.f_get_deppole(substr(To_char(sit.codsg, 'FM0000000'),1,5)) libpole_g, res.rnom nom_g, res.rprenom prenom_g, res.rtel tel_g, rtrim(imm.iadrabr) immeuble_g, res.batiment|| res.etage|| res.bureau bureau_g, sit.ident ident_g, res.matricule matricule_g, sit.prestation prestation_g, sit.mode_contractuel_indicatif mci_g, sit.soccode societe_g, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..','****',decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','Interv. forf.',to_char(sit.cout,'FM999999999D00'))) cout_g, st.gnom responsable_g, to_char(st.codsg, 'FM0000000') code_g, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','',to_char(lc.lresfin,'dd/mm/yyyy')) echeance_g, --decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','',decode(sit.soccode,'SG..','****',to_char(sit.datdep,'dd/mm/yyyy'))) echeance_g, sit.cpident code_CP_g, sit.fident Code_lien_forf_g, -- champs pour faire les totaux des effectifs decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',1,0) SG_g , decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',0,1) SSII_g , decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'GRA',1,0),0) SG_GRA_g, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'INT',1,0),0) SG_INT_g, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'STA',1,0),0) SG_STA_g, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'IFO',1,0),0) SG_IFO_g, decode(sit.prestation,'STA',1,decode(sit.prestation,'INT',1,decode(sit.prestation,'GRA',1,decode(sit.prestation,'IFO',1,0))))GRA_INT_STA_g from situ_ress_full sit, ligne_cont lc, ressource res, struct_info st, immeuble imm where res.icodimm = imm.icodimm(+) and sit.ident=res.ident --and res.rtype='P' and sit.codsg=st.codsg and sit.ident=lc.ident --and sit.soccode <> 'SG..' -- situation en cours (dans le mois) and to_char(sit.datsitu,'yyyymm') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') -- si il existe encore une ligne contrat --and to_char(lc.lresfin,'yyyymm') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and ( to_char(sit.datdep,'yyyymm') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or sit.datdep is null) and lc.lresfin in (select max(l.lresfin) from ligne_cont l where l.ident=res.ident and to_char(l.lresdeb,'yyyymm') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and ( to_char(l.lresfin,'yyyymm') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or l.lresfin is null) ) and sit.type_situ='N' &P_WHERE UNION -- cas 2 -- ressource avec une situation en cours sans contrat select distinct pack_utile.f_get_deppole(substr(To_char(sit.codsg, 'FM0000000'),1,5)) libpole_g, res.rnom nom_g, res.rprenom prenom_g, res.rtel tel_g, rtrim(imm.iadrabr) immeuble_g, res.batiment|| res.etage|| res.bureau bureau_g, sit.ident ident_g, res.matricule matricule_g, sit.prestation prestation_g, sit.mode_contractuel_indicatif mci_g, sit.soccode societe_g, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..','****',decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','Interv. forf.',to_char(sit.cout,'FM999999999D00'))) cout_g, st.gnom responsable_g, to_char(st.codsg, 'FM0000000') code_g, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','',decode(sit.soccode,'SG..','****','')) echeance_g, sit.cpident code_CP_g, sit.fident Code_lien_forf_g, -- champs pour faire les totaux des effectifs decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',1,0) SG_g , decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',0,1) SSII_g , decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'GRA',1,0),0) SG_GRA_g, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'INT',1,0),0) SG_INT_g, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'STA',1,0),0) SG_STA_g, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'IFO',1,0),0) SG_IFO_g, decode(sit.prestation,'STA',1,decode(sit.prestation,'INT',1,decode(sit.prestation,'GRA',1,decode(sit.prestation,'IFO',1,0))))GRA_INT_STA_g from situ_ress_full sit, ressource res, struct_info st, immeuble imm where res.icodimm = imm.icodimm(+) and sit.ident=res.ident --and res.rtype='P' and sit.codsg=st.codsg -- situation en cours (dans le mois) and to_char(sit.datsitu,'yyyymm') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and ( to_char(sit.datdep,'yyyymm') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or sit.datdep is null) and sit.type_situ='N' --pas de contrat and res.ident NOT IN (select lc.ident from ligne_cont lc where to_char(lc.lresdeb,'yyyymm')<= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and (to_char(lc.lresfin,'yyyymm')>= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or lc.lresfin is null )) --and sit.type_situ='N' &P_WHERE order by nom_g,prenom_g;

dataDescriptor.expression: decode ( sit.prestation , 'STA' , 1 , decode ( sit.prestation , 'INT' , 1 , decode ( sit.prestation , 'GRA' , 1 , decode ( sit.prestation , 'IFO' , 1 , 0 ) ) ) )
decode ( sit.soccode , 'SG..' , '****' , decode ( sit.prestation , 'IFO' , 'Interv. forf.' , to_char ( sit.cout , 'FM999999999D00' ) ) )

dataSource.name: Q_DEP
dataSource.select:
-- cas 1 -- ressource avec une situation en cours select distinct pack_utile.f_get_dep(substr(To_char(sit.codsg, 'FM0000000'),1,3)) libdep, res.rnom nom, res.rprenom prenom, res.rtel tel, rtrim(imm.iadrabr) immeuble, res.batiment|| res.etage|| res.bureau bureau, sit.ident ident, res.matricule matricule, sit.prestation prestation, sit.mode_contractuel_indicatif mci, sit.soccode societe, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..','****',decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','Interv. forf.',to_char(sit.cout,'FM999999999D00'))) cout, st.gnom responsable, substr(TO_CHAR(st.codsg, 'FM0000000'), 0, 3) code, --decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','',decode(sit.soccode,'SG..','****',to_char(lc.lresfin,'dd/mm/yyyy'))) echeance, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','',to_char(lc.lresfin,'dd/mm/yyyy')) echeance, sit.cpident code_CP, sit.fident Code_lien_forf, -- champs pour faire les totaux des effectifs decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',1,0) SG , decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',0,1) SSII , decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'GRA',1,0),0) SG_GRA, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'INT',1,0),0) SG_INT, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'STA',1,0),0) SG_STA, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'IFO',1,0),0) SG_IFO, decode(sit.prestation,'STA',1,decode(sit.prestation,'INT',1,decode(sit.prestation,'GRA',1,decode(sit.prestation,'IFO',1,0))))GRA_INT_STA from situ_ress_full sit, ligne_cont lc, ressource res, struct_info st, immeuble imm
where res.icodimm = imm.icodimm(+) and sit.ident=res.ident --and res.rtype='P' and sit.codsg=st.codsg --and sit.soccode <> 'SG..' and sit.ident=lc.ident -- situation en cours (dans le mois) and to_char(sit.datsitu,'yyyymm') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and ( to_char(sit.datdep,'yyyymm') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or sit.datdep is null) and lc.lresfin in (select max(l.lresfin) from ligne_cont l where l.ident=res.ident and to_char(l.lresdeb,'yyyymm') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and ( to_char(l.lresfin,'yyyymm') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or l.lresfin is null) ) and sit.type_situ='N' &P_WHERE UNION -- cas 2 -- ressource avec une situation en cours select distinct pack_utile.f_get_dep(substr(To_char(sit.codsg, 'FM0000000'),1,3)) libdep, res.rnom nom, res.rprenom prenom, res.rtel tel, rtrim(imm.iadrabr) immeuble, res.batiment|| res.etage|| res.bureau bureau, sit.ident ident, res.matricule matricule, sit.prestation prestation, sit.mode_contractuel_indicatif mci, sit.soccode societe, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..','****',decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','Interv. forf.',to_char(sit.cout,'FM999999999D00'))) cout, st.gnom responsable, substr(TO_CHAR(st.codsg, 'FM0000000'),0,3) code, decode(sit.prestation,'IFO','',decode(sit.soccode,'SG..','****','')) echeance, sit.cpident code_CP, sit.fident Code_lien_forf, -- champs pour faire les totaux des effectifs decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',1,0) SG , decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',0,1) SSII , decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'GRA',1,0),0) SG_GRA, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'INT',1,0),0) SG_INT, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'STA',1,0),0) SG_STA, decode(sit.soccode,'SG..',decode(sit.prestation,'IFO',1,0),0) SG_IFO, decode(sit.prestation,'STA',1,decode(sit.prestation,'INT',1,decode(sit.prestation,'GRA',1,decode(sit.prestation,'IFO',1,0))))GRA_INT_STA from situ_ress_full sit, ressource res, struct_info st, immeuble imm
where res.icodimm = imm.icodimm(+) and sit.ident=res.ident --and res.rtype='P' and sit.codsg=st.codsg -- situation en cours (dans le mois) and to_char(sit.datsitu,'yyyymm') <= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and ( to_char(sit.datdep,'yyyymm') >= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or sit.datdep is null) and sit.type_situ='N' and res.ident NOT IN (select lc.ident from ligne_cont lc where to_char(lc.lresdeb,'yyyymm')<= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') and (to_char(lc.lresfin,'yyyymm')>= to_char(sysdate,'yyyymm') or lc.lresfin is null )) &P_WHERE
order by 2,3,code;

dataDescriptor.expression: decode ( sit.prestation , 'STA' , 1 , decode ( sit.prestation , 'INT' , 1 , decode ( sit.prestation , 'GRA' , 1 , decode ( sit.prestation , 'IFO' , 1 , 0 ) ) ) )
decode ( sit.soccode , 'SG..' , '****' , decode ( sit.prestation , 'IFO' , 'Interv. forf.' , to_char ( sit.cout , 'FM999999999D00' ) ) )

<%@ taglib uri="/WEB-INF/lib/reports_tld.jar" prefix="rw" %> <%@ page language="java" import="java.io.*" errorPage="/rwerror.jsp" session="false" %> <%@ page contentType="text/html;charset=ISO-8859-1" %> <!-- <rw:report id="report"> <rw:objects id="objects"> </rw:objects> -->
